title: Tim Farron – 2015 Speech on Syrian Air Strikes
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Tim Farron, the Leader of the Liberal Democrats, in the House of Commons on 2 December 2015.
content:

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
